blog.name: vickypediacotton
blog.title: Between Dark, Light and Real Life
blog.description: • Victoria • 13 • Aspiring Writer and Artist • current writing project: Between Dark and Light • Fan of... • Gravity Falls • Pokémon • Warrior Cats • writing blog: storywritervicky.tumblr.com • LGBTQ+ ally •

body:
The Pokémon direct

I know I am late, but I was really unlucky that the direct is on the 27.2.19 Wednesday. Because I am always busy on Wednesday. Always.

So, I come home and get no acces to reactions, nor the actual subbed direct. I only find the Japanese one. And I have no clue why but I had to do some digging to find the subbed direct. ANYWAYS,

THEY HAVE A FIRE TYPED BUNNY STARTER AND THE REGION LOOKS SO INCREDIBLE GERMAN/DUTCH/AUSTRIAN (AND SO ON) LIKE, AND I FRIGGIN LOVE IT!

blog.name: turbofireyoshi
blog.title: Welcome to my Tumblr!
blog.description: Hello there! I'm Turbofireyoshi! I mostly post my drawings, comics, and animations here, or reblog stuff that I like. (Expect to see a lot of cats, I'm a cat lover! 💖🐱😍) I also have some Deviantart accounts (Turbofireyoshi and Jittersjockbird22) where I draw other stuff. And I've got another Tumblr (aspieblogger) that I'm more active on than here. I blog about Autism acceptance there. :3 Oh, and I suppose I should mention my Twitter account (Turbofireyoshi1) even though I'm not really that partial to Twitter, I really only made it to get free points in Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp. Lol XD Anyway, that's all I've got to say. I hope you enjoy your stay here! :3

summary: So, the Galar region kinda looks like it's based on the UK. My question is are we gonna get some fairy type lore or dex entries...
body:
So, the Galar region kinda looks like it’s based on the UK. My question is are we gonna get some fairy type lore or dex entries similar to real world folklore about the fair folk?

Like fairy rings being used by morelull/shiinotic to take people away, leaving out milk and honey for whimsicott or something, fairy mounds in the middle of bustling cities that you Should Not Mess With if you know what’s good for you etc. etc.

A fire/fairy will-o-the wisp pokémon would be cool too. Idk it’s just something I’ve thought about since fairy types were first announced.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: probablynotpsychotic
blog.title: Mormémon
blog.description: I'm Mormon and I love Pokémon, that's all you need to know.

summary: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i'm personally the most excited for...
body: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i’m personally the most excited for gold and silver on virtual console because Johto is the most mysterious to me and because of steelix, umbreon, the legendary dogs, totodile cyndiquil and chicorita (in that order), and the mareep line.

reblog.comment: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i’m personally the most excited for gold and silver on virtual console because Johto is the most mysterious to me and because of steelix, umbreon, the legendary dogs, totodile cyndiquil and chicorita (in that order), and the mareep line.

trail.content_raw: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i’m personally the most excited for gold and silver on virtual console because Johto is the most mysterious to me and because of steelix, umbreon, the legendary dogs, totodile cyndiquil and chicorita (in that order), and the mareep line.
trail.content: sure, pokken for the switch and ultra sun and ultra moon are cool announcements and all, but i’m personally the most excited for gold and silver on virtual console because Johto is the most mysterious to me and because of steelix, umbreon, the legendary dogs, totodile cyndiquil and chicorita (in that order), and the mareep line.

summary: Pokémon Direct: annunciati Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento per la Virtual Console di Nintendo 3DS
title: Pokémon Direct: annunciati Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento per la Virtual Console di Nintendo 3DS
body:
Pokémon Direct: annunciati Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento per la Virtual Console di Nintendo 3DS

A settembre anche la seconda generazione dei Pokémon arriverà su Nintendo 3DS tramite la Virtual Console. Annunciati Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento.

Nel corso del Pokémon Direct tenutosi ieri, oltre all’annuncio di Pokémon Ultrasole e Pokémon Ultraluna, The Pokémon Company ha annunciato l’arrivo di Pokémon Oro e Pokémon Argento sulla Virtual Console di Nintendo 3DS. (more…)

View On WordPress
